short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that analyses Sentiments and Sarcasm in YouTube comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SentiTube analyzes the sentiment and sarcasm of YouTube video comments to provide you with valuable insights about the audience's feedback and engagement. By analyzing sarcasm as well as  sentiment of YouTube video comments, we provide you with more accurate sentiment results, named "SentiTube Results". 
SentiTube's Website provide you with more detailed insights into the sentiment and sarcasm of YouTube video comments, including custom feedback and a breakdown of positive, negative, and neutral sentiment, as well as sarcasm analysis results. With these insights, you can better understand your audience's opinions and reactions towards a video.
Whether you're a content creator looking to improve your videos or a YouTube user seeking to understand community's feedback towards a video, SentiTube is the tool you need. Try our sentiment analysis tool today and unlock the power of audience insights for any YouTube video!
